main event: Five objects described as fire-balls or flying saucers were observed in the sky while driving between Kit Carson and Cheyenne Wells, Colorado.
interesting points: The objects were observed at a speed estimated to be about 500 miles per hour., Two of the larger objects appeared to be luminous and maneuvered in the sky., The three smaller objects circled and glowed like molten metal., The sighting lasted for over one minute with various movements including hovering and vertical flight., After disappearing from sight, the direction of the objects was noted to be towards the northeast.
location: Kit Carson and Cheyenne Wells, Colorado, USA
witness description: Major Donald E. Keyhoe, Intelligence Officer, driving between locations
